00001 /**
00002  * @file ccnd_internal_client.c
00003  *
00004  * Internal client of ccnd, handles requests for
00005  * inspecting and controlling operation of the ccnd;
00006  * requests and responses themselves use ccn protocols.
00007  *
00008  * Part of ccnd - the CCNx Daemon.
00009  *
00010  * Copyright (C) 2009-2010 Palo Alto Research Center, Inc.

00013  * the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2 as published by the

00016  * WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or

00018  * for more details. You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public
00019  * License along with this program; if not, write to the
00020  * Free Software Foundation, Inc., 51 Franklin Street, Fifth Floor,

00054 
00055 static void
00056 ccnd_init_service_ccnb(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
00057 {
00058     const char *baseuri = "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.localhost/%C1.M.SRV/ccnd/KEY";
00059     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00060     struct ccn *h = ccnd->internal_client;
00061     struct ccn_charbuf *name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00062     struct ccn_charbuf *pubid = ccn_charbuf_create();
00063     struct ccn_charbuf *pubkey = ccn_charbuf_create();
00064     struct ccn_charbuf *keyid = ccn_charbuf_create();
00065     struct ccn_charbuf *cob = ccn_charbuf_create();
00066     int res;
00067     
00068     res = ccn_get_public_key(h, NULL, pubid, pubkey);
00069     if (res < 0) abort();
00070     ccn_name_from_uri(name, baseuri);
00071     ccn_charbuf_append_value(keyid, CCN_MARKER_CONTROL, 1);
00072     ccn_charbuf_append_string(keyid, ".M.K");
00073     ccn_charbuf_append_value(keyid, 0, 1);
00074     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(keyid, pubid);
00075     ccn_name_append(name, keyid->buf, keyid->length);
00076     ccn_create_version(h, name, CCN_V_NOW, 0, 0);
00077     sp.template_ccnb = ccn_charbuf_create();
00078     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_SignedInfo, CCN_DTAG);
00079     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator, CCN_DTAG);
00080     ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_KeyName, CCN_DTAG);
00081     ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(sp.template_ccnb, name);
00082     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00083 //    ccn_charbuf_append_tt(sp.template_ccnb, CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest,
00084 //                          CCN_DTAG);
00085 //    ccn_charbuf_append_charbuf(sp.template_ccnb, pubid);
00086 //    ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00087     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00088     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(sp.template_ccnb);
00089     sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_TEMPL_KEY_LOCATOR;
00090     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "%00");
00091     sp.sp_flags |= CCN_SP_FINAL_BLOCK;
00092     sp.type = CCN_CONTENT_KEY;
00093     sp.freshness = 300;
00094     res = ccn_sign_content(h, cob, name, &sp, pubkey->buf, pubkey->length);
00095     if (res != 0) abort();
00096     ccnd->service_ccnb = cob;
00097     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00098     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&pubid);
00099     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&pubkey);
00100     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&keyid);
00101     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&sp.template_ccnb);
00102 }
00103 
00104 /**
00105  * Local interpretation of selfp->intdata
00106  */
00107 #define MORECOMPS_MASK 0x007F
00108 #define MUST_VERIFY    0x0080
00109 #define MUST_VERIFY1   (MUST_VERIFY + 1)
00110 #define OPER_MASK      0xFF00
00111 #define OP_PING        0x0000
00112 #define OP_NEWFACE     0x0200
00113 #define OP_DESTROYFACE 0x0300
00114 #define OP_PREFIXREG   0x0400
00115 #define OP_SELFREG     0x0500
00116 #define OP_UNREG       0x0600
00117 #define OP_NOTICE      0x0700
00118 #define OP_SERVICE     0x0800
00119 /**
00120  * Common interest handler for ccnd_internal_client
00121  */
00122 static enum ccn_upcall_res
00123 ccnd_answer_req(struct ccn_closure *selfp,
00124                  enum ccn_upcall_kind kind,
00125                  struct ccn_upcall_info *info)
00126 {
00127     struct ccn_charbuf *msg = NULL;
00128     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00129     struct ccn_charbuf *keylocator = NULL;
00130     struct ccn_charbuf *signed_info = NULL;
00131     struct ccn_charbuf *reply_body = NULL;
00132     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = NULL;
00133     int res = 0;
00134     int start = 0;
00135     int end = 0;
00136     int morecomps = 0;
00137     const unsigned char *final_comp = NULL;
00138     size_t final_size = 0;
00139     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00140     
00141     switch (kind) {
00142         case CCN_UPCALL_FINAL:
00143             free(selfp);
00144             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00145         case CCN_UPCALL_INTEREST:
00146             break;
00147         case CCN_UPCALL_CONSUMED_INTEREST:
00148             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00149         default:
00150             return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR);
00151     }
00152     ccnd = (struct ccnd_handle *)selfp->data;
00153     if ((ccnd->debug & 128) != 0)
00154         ccnd_debug_ccnb(ccnd, __LINE__, "ccnd_answer_req", NULL,
00155                         info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
00156     morecomps = selfp->intdata & MORECOMPS_MASK;
00157     if (selfp->intdata != OP_SERVICE &&
00158           (info->pi->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_NEW) == 0)
00159         return(CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_OK);
00160     if (info->matched_comps >= info->interest_comps->n)
00161         goto Bail;
00162     if (selfp->intdata != OP_PING &&
00163         selfp->intdata != OP_NOTICE &&
00164         selfp->intdata != OP_SERVICE &&
00165         info->pi->prefix_comps != info->matched_comps + morecomps)
00166         goto Bail;
00167     if (morecomps == 1) {
00168         res = ccn_name_comp_get(info->interest_ccnb, info->interest_comps,
00169                                 info->matched_comps,
00170                                 &final_comp, &final_size);
00171         if (res < 0)
00172             goto Bail;
00173     }
00174 GOT_HERE    
00175     if ((selfp->intdata & MUST_VERIFY) != 0) {
00176         struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject pco = {0};
00177         // XXX - probably should check for message origin BEFORE verify
00178         res = ccn_parse_ContentObject(final_comp, final_size, &pco, NULL);
00179         if (res < 0) {
00180             ccnd_debug_ccnb(ccnd, __LINE__, "co_parse_failed", NULL,
00181                             info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
00182             goto Bail;
00183         }
00184         res = ccn_verify_content(info->h, final_comp, &pco);
00185         if (res != 0) {
00186             ccnd_debug_ccnb(ccnd, __LINE__, "co_verify_failed", NULL,
00187                             info->interest_ccnb, info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E]);
00188             goto Bail;
00189         }
00190     }
00191     sp.freshness = 10;
00192     switch (selfp->intdata & OPER_MASK) {
00193         case OP_PING:
00194             reply_body = ccn_charbuf_create();
00195             sp.freshness = (info->pi->prefix_comps == info->matched_comps) ? 60 : 5;
00196             break;
00197         case OP_NEWFACE:
00198             reply_body = ccnd_req_newface(ccnd, final_comp, final_size);
00199             break;
00200         case OP_DESTROYFACE:
00201             reply_body = ccnd_req_destroyface(ccnd, final_comp, final_size);
00202             break;
00203         case OP_PREFIXREG:
00204             reply_body = ccnd_req_prefixreg(ccnd, final_comp, final_size);
00205             break;
00206         case OP_SELFREG:
00207             reply_body = ccnd_req_selfreg(ccnd, final_comp, final_size);
00208             break;
00209         case OP_UNREG:
00210             reply_body = ccnd_req_unreg(ccnd, final_comp, final_size);
00211             break;
00212         case OP_NOTICE:
00213             ccnd_start_notice(ccnd);
00214             goto Bail;
00215             break;
00216         case OP_SERVICE:
00217             if (ccnd->service_ccnb == NULL)
00218                 ccnd_init_service_ccnb(ccnd);
00219             if (ccn_content_matches_interest(
00220                     ccnd->service_ccnb->buf,
00221                     ccnd->service_ccnb->length,
00222                     1,
00223                     NULL,
00224                     info->interest_ccnb,
00225                     info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_E],
00226                     info->pi
00227                 )) {
00228                 ccn_put(info->h, ccnd->service_ccnb->buf,
00229                                  ccnd->service_ccnb->length);
00230                 res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
00231                 goto Finish;
00232             }
00233             goto Bail;
00234             break;
00235         default:
00236             goto Bail;
00237     }
00238     if (reply_body == NULL)
00239         goto Bail;
00240     
00241     msg = ccn_charbuf_create();
00242     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00243     start = info->pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_Name];
00244     end = info->interest_comps->buf[info->pi->prefix_comps];
00245     ccn_charbuf_append(name, info->interest_ccnb + start, end - start);
00246     ccn_charbuf_append_closer(name);
00247     res = ccn_sign_content(info->h, msg, name, &sp,
00248                            reply_body->buf, reply_body->length);
00249     if (res < 0)
00250         goto Bail;
00251     if ((ccnd->debug & 128) != 0)
00252         ccnd_debug_ccnb(ccnd, __LINE__, "ccnd_answer_req_response", NULL,
00253                         msg->buf, msg->length);
00254     res = ccn_put(info->h, msg->buf, msg->length);
00255     if (res < 0)
00256         goto Bail;
00257     if (CCND_TEST_100137)
00258         ccn_put(info->h, msg->buf, msg->length);
00259     res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_INTEREST_CONSUMED;
00260     goto Finish;
00261 Bail:
00262     res = CCN_UPCALL_RESULT_ERR;
00263 Finish:
00264     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&msg);
00265     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00266     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&keylocator);
00267     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&reply_body);
00268     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&signed_info);
00269     return(res);
00270 }
00271 
00272 static int
00273 ccnd_internal_client_refresh(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00274                void *clienth,
00275                struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00276                int flags)
00277 {
00278     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
00279     int microsec = 0;
00280     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) == 0 &&
00281           ccnd->internal_client != NULL &&
00282           ccnd->internal_client_refresh == ev) {
00283         microsec = ccn_process_scheduled_operations(ccnd->internal_client);
00284         if (microsec > ev->evint)
00285             microsec = ev->evint;
00286     }
00287     if (microsec <= 0 && ccnd->internal_client_refresh == ev)
00288         ccnd->internal_client_refresh = NULL;
00289     return(microsec);
00290 }
00291 
00292 #define CCND_ID_TEMPL "XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX"
00293 
00294 static void
00295 ccnd_uri_listen(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, const char *uri,
00296                 ccn_handler p, intptr_t intdata)
00297 {
00298     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
00299     struct ccn_charbuf *uri_modified = NULL;
00300     struct ccn_closure *closure;
00301     struct ccn_indexbuf *comps;
00302     const unsigned char *comp;
00303     size_t comp_size;
00304     size_t offset;
00305     int reg_wanted = 1;
00306     
00307     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00308     ccn_name_from_uri(name, uri);
00309     comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
00310     if (ccn_name_split(name, comps) < 0)
00311         abort();
00312     if (ccn_name_comp_get(name->buf, comps, 1, &comp, &comp_size) >= 0) {
00313         if (comp_size == 32 && 0 == memcmp(comp, CCND_ID_TEMPL, 32)) {
00314             /* Replace placeholder with our ccnd_id */
00315             offset = comp - name->buf;
00316             memcpy(name->buf + offset, ccnd->ccnd_id, 32);
00317             uri_modified = ccn_charbuf_create();
00318             ccn_uri_append(uri_modified, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00319             uri = (char *)uri_modified->buf;
00320             reg_wanted = 0;
00321         }
00322     }
00323     closure = calloc(1, sizeof(*closure));
00324     closure->p = p;
00325     closure->data = ccnd;
00326     closure->intdata = intdata;
00327     /* Register explicitly if needed or requested */
00328     if (reg_wanted)
00329         ccnd_reg_uri(ccnd, uri,
00330                      0, /* special faceid for internal client */
00331                      CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | CCN_FORW_ACTIVE,
00332                      0x7FFFFFFF);
00333     ccn_set_interest_filter(ccnd->internal_client, name, closure);
00334     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00335     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri_modified);
00336     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&comps);
00337 }
00338 
00339 /**
00340  * Make a forwarding table entry for ccnx:/ccnx/CCNDID
00341  * 
00342  * This one entry handles most of the namespace served by the 
00343  * ccnd internal client.
00344  */
00345 static void
00346 ccnd_reg_ccnx_ccndid(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
00347 {
00348     struct ccn_charbuf *name;
00349     struct ccn_charbuf *uri;
00350     
00351     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00352     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/ccnx");
00353     ccn_name_append(name, ccnd->ccnd_id, 32);
00354     uri = ccn_charbuf_create();
00355     ccn_uri_append(uri, name->buf, name->length, 1);
00356     ccnd_reg_uri(ccnd, ccn_charbuf_as_string(uri),
00357                  0, /* special faceid for internal client */
00358                  (CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | 
00359                   CCN_FORW_ACTIVE        |
00360                   CCN_FORW_CAPTURE       |
00361                   CCN_FORW_ADVERTISE     ),
00362                  0x7FFFFFFF);
00363     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00364     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&uri);
00365 }
00366 
00367 #ifndef CCN_PATH_VAR_TMP
00368 #define CCN_PATH_VAR_TMP "/var/tmp"
00369 #endif
00370 
00371 /*
00372  * This is used to shroud the contents of the keystore, which mainly serves
00373  * to add integrity checking and defense against accidental misuse.
00374  * The file permissions serve for restricting access to the private keys.
00375  */
00376 #ifndef CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS
00377 #define CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS "\010\043\103\375\327\237\152\351\155"
00378 #endif
00379 
00380 int
00381 ccnd_init_internal_keystore(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
00382 {
00383     struct ccn_charbuf *temp = NULL;
00384     struct ccn_charbuf *cmd = NULL;
00385     struct ccn_charbuf *culprit = NULL;
00386     struct stat statbuf;
00387     const char *dir = NULL;
00388     int res = -1;
00389     size_t save;
00390     char *keystore_path = NULL;
00391     FILE *passfile;
00392     struct ccn_signing_params sp = CCN_SIGNING_PARAMS_INIT;
00393     
00394     if (ccnd->internal_client == NULL)
00395         return(-1);
00396     temp = ccn_charbuf_create();
00397     cmd = ccn_charbuf_create();
00398     dir = getenv("CCND_KEYSTORE_DIRECTORY");
00399     if (dir != NULL && dir[0] == '/')
00400         ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, "%s/", dir);
00401     else
00402         ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, CCN_PATH_VAR_TMP "/.ccnx-user%d/", (int)geteuid());
00403     res = stat(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp), &statbuf);
00404     if (res == -1) {
00405         if (errno == ENOENT)
00406             res = mkdir(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp), 0700);
00407         if (res != 0) {
00408             culprit = temp;
00409             goto Finish;
00410         }
00411     }
00412     save = temp->length;
00413     ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, ".ccnd_keystore_%s", ccnd->portstr);
00414     keystore_path = strdup(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp));
00415     res = stat(keystore_path, &statbuf);
00416     if (res == 0)
00417         res = ccn_load_default_key(ccnd->internal_client, keystore_path, CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS);
00418     if (res >= 0)
00419         goto Finish;
00420     /* No stored keystore that we can access; create one. */
00421     temp->length = save;
00422     ccn_charbuf_putf(temp, "p");
00423     passfile = fopen(ccn_charbuf_as_string(temp), "wb");
00424     fprintf(passfile, "%s", CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS);
00425     fclose(passfile);
00426     ccn_charbuf_putf(cmd, "%s-init-keystore-helper %s",
00427                      ccnd->progname, keystore_path);
00428     res = system(ccn_charbuf_as_string(cmd));
00429     if (res != 0) {
00430         culprit = cmd;
00431         goto Finish;
00432     }
00433     res = ccn_load_default_key(ccnd->internal_client, keystore_path, CCND_KEYSTORE_PASS);
00434 Finish:
00435     if (culprit != NULL) {
00436         ccnd_msg(ccnd, "%s: %s:\n", ccn_charbuf_as_string(culprit), strerror(errno));
00437         culprit = NULL;
00438     }
00439     res = ccn_chk_signing_params(ccnd->internal_client, NULL, &sp, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00440     if (res != 0)
00441         abort();
00442     memcpy(ccnd->ccnd_id, sp.pubid, sizeof(ccnd->ccnd_id));
00443     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&temp);
00444     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&cmd);
00445     if (keystore_path != NULL)
00446         free(keystore_path);
00447     return(res);
00448 }
00449 
00450 static int
00451 post_face_notice(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, unsigned faceid)
00452 {
00453     struct face *face = ccnd_face_from_faceid(ccnd, faceid);
00454     struct ccn_charbuf *msg = ccn_charbuf_create();
00455     int res = -1;
00456     int port;
00457     
00458     // XXX - text version for trying out stream stuff - replace with ccnb
00459     if (face == NULL)
00460         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, "destroyface(%u);\n", faceid);
00461     else {
00462         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, "newface(%u, 0x%x", faceid, face->flags);
00463         if (face->addr != NULL &&
00464             (face->flags & (CCN_FACE_INET | CCN_FACE_INET6)) != 0) {
00465             ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ", ");
00466             port = ccn_charbuf_append_sockaddr(msg, face->addr);
00467             if (port < 0)
00468                 msg->length--;
00469             else if (port > 0)
00470                 ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ":%d", port);
00471         }
00472         ccn_charbuf_putf(msg, ");\n", faceid);
00473     }
00474     GOT_HERE res = ccn_seqw_write(ccnd->notice, msg->buf, msg->length);
00475     GOT_HERE ccn_charbuf_destroy(&msg);
00476     return(res);
00477 }
00478 
00479 static int
00480 ccnd_notice_push(struct ccn_schedule *sched,
00481                void *clienth,
00482                struct ccn_scheduled_event *ev,
00483                int flags)
00484 {
00485     struct ccnd_handle *ccnd = clienth;
00486     struct ccn_indexbuf *chface = NULL;
00487     int i = 0;
00488     int j = 0;
00489     int microsec = 0;
00490     int res = 0;
00491     
00492     if ((flags & CCN_SCHEDULE_CANCEL) == 0 &&
00493             ccnd->notice != NULL &&
00494             ccnd->notice_push == ev &&
00495             ccnd->chface != NULL) {
00496         GOT_HERE chface = ccnd->chface;
00497         ccn_seqw_batch_start(ccnd->notice);
00498         for (i = 0; i < chface->n && res != -1; i++)
00499             res = post_face_notice(ccnd, chface->buf[i]);
00500         ccn_seqw_batch_end(ccnd->notice);
00501 GOT_HERE
00502         for (j = 0; i < chface->n; i++, j++)
00503             chface->buf[j] = chface->buf[i];
00504         chface->n = j;
00505         if (res == -1)
00506             microsec = 3000;
00507         GOT_HERE if (0) ccnd_internal_client_reschedule(ccnd);
00508     }
00509     if (microsec <= 0)
00510         ccnd->notice_push = NULL;
00511     return(microsec);
00512 }
00513 
00514 /**
00515  * Called by ccnd when a face undergoes a substantive status change that
00516  * should be reported to interested parties.
00517  * 
00518  * In the destroy case, this is called frome the hash table finalizer,
00519  * so it shouldn't do much directly.  Inspecting the face is OK, though.
00520  */
00521 void
00522 ccnd_face_status_change(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd, unsigned faceid)
00523 {
00524     struct ccn_indexbuf *chface = ccnd->chface;
00525     if (chface != NULL) {
00526 GOT_HERE
00527         ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(chface, faceid);
00528         if (ccnd->notice_push == NULL)
00529             ccnd->notice_push = ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, 2000,
00530                                                    ccnd_notice_push,
00531                                                    NULL, 0);
00532     }
00533 }
00534 
00535 static void
00536 ccnd_start_notice(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
00537 {
00538     struct ccn *h = ccnd->internal_client;
00539     struct ccn_charbuf *name = NULL;
00540     struct face *face = NULL;
00541     int i;
00542     
00543     if (h == NULL)
00544         return;
00545     if (ccnd->notice != NULL)
00546         return;
00547     if (ccnd->chface != NULL) {
00548         /* Probably should not happen. */
00549         ccnd_msg(ccnd, "ccnd_internal_client.c:%d Huh?", __LINE__);
00550         ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ccnd->chface);
00551     }
00552 GOT_HERE
00553     name = ccn_charbuf_create();
00554     ccn_name_from_uri(name, "ccnx:/ccnx");
00555     ccn_name_append(name, ccnd->ccnd_id, 32);
00556     ccn_name_append_str(name, CCND_NOTICE_NAME);
00557     ccnd->notice = ccn_seqw_create(h, name);
00558     ccnd->chface = ccn_indexbuf_create();
00559     for (i = 0; i < ccnd->face_limit; i++) {
00560         face = ccnd->faces_by_faceid[i];
00561         if (face != NULL)
00562             ccn_indexbuf_set_insert(ccnd->chface, face->faceid);
00563     }
00564     if (ccnd->chface->n > 0)
00565         ccnd_face_status_change(ccnd, ccnd->chface->buf[0]);
00566     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&name);
00567 }
00568 
00569 int
00570 ccnd_internal_client_start(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
00571 {
00572     struct ccn *h;
00573     if (ccnd->internal_client != NULL)
00574         return(-1);
00575     if (ccnd->face0 == NULL)
00576         abort();
00577     ccnd->internal_client = h = ccn_create();
00578     if (ccnd_init_internal_keystore(ccnd) < 0) {
00579         ccn_destroy(&ccnd->internal_client);
00580         return(-1);
00581     }
00582     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/ping",
00583                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_PING);
00584     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/ping",
00585                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_PING);
00586     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/newface",
00587                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_NEWFACE + MUST_VERIFY1);
00588     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/destroyface",
00589                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_DESTROYFACE + MUST_VERIFY1);
00590     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/prefixreg",
00591                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_PREFIXREG + MUST_VERIFY1);
00592     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/selfreg",
00593                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_SELFREG + MUST_VERIFY1);
00594     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/unreg",
00595                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_UNREG + MUST_VERIFY1);
00596     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/ccnx/" CCND_ID_TEMPL "/" CCND_NOTICE_NAME,
00597                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_NOTICE);
00598     ccnd_uri_listen(ccnd, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.localhost/%C1.M.SRV/ccnd",
00599                     &ccnd_answer_req, OP_SERVICE);
00600     ccnd_reg_ccnx_ccndid(ccnd);
00601     ccnd_reg_uri(ccnd, "ccnx:/%C1.M.S.localhost",
00602                  0, /* special faceid for internal client */
00603                  (CCN_FORW_CHILD_INHERIT | 
00604                   CCN_FORW_ACTIVE        |
00605                   CCN_FORW_LOCAL         ),
00606                  0x7FFFFFFF);
00607     ccnd->internal_client_refresh \
00608     = ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, 50000,
00609                          ccnd_internal_client_refresh,
00610                          NULL, CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC);
00611     return(0);
00612 }
00613 
00614 static void
00615 ccnd_internal_client_reschedule(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
00616 {
00617     if (ccnd->internal_client_refresh == NULL)
00618         return;
00619     ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnd->sched, ccnd->internal_client_refresh);
00620     ccnd->internal_client_refresh \
00621     = ccn_schedule_event(ccnd->sched, 0,
00622                          ccnd_internal_client_refresh,
00623                          NULL, CCN_INTEREST_LIFETIME_MICROSEC);
00624 }
00625 
00626 void
00627 ccnd_internal_client_stop(struct ccnd_handle *ccnd)
00628 {
00629     ccnd->notice = NULL; /* ccn_destroy will free */
00630     if (ccnd->notice_push != NULL)
00631         ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnd->sched, ccnd->notice_push);
00632     ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&ccnd->chface);
00633     ccn_destroy(&ccnd->internal_client);
00634     ccn_charbuf_destroy(&ccnd->service_ccnb);
00635     if (ccnd->internal_client_refresh != NULL)
00636         ccn_schedule_cancel(ccnd->sched, ccnd->internal_client_refresh);
00637 }
